segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , open your mouth and let me have a look . It is nothing serious . You haven't got a fever . But you should take the medicine and need have more rest recently . When you feel well , you could take more exercises , or play sports like basketball , running , and swimming . And eating healthy food , having more fruits and vegetable and drinking milk are good for your heath .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I see . Thanks a lot .
segments.speaker: S2
